summary: Tonsillitis is an inflammation (swelling) of the tonsils, sometimes occurring along with swollen adenoids.
risk_factors: Being a child over age two
Being a child ages 5-15 (for bacterial tonsillitis)
Being a younger child (for viral tonsillitis)
symptoms: White or yellow coating on tonsils
diagnosis: Assessment of symptoms and medical history
Physical examination of throat and neck
